title: Ability to select default browser for links
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
When I open links it always opens Google Chrome. I use Firefox.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
I'd like an option / an explanation of how to pick a default browser for my links.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
I have tried looking through the Issues on GitHub / the settings in the app and nothing is seemingly respecting the default browser of my OS (Ubuntu 24)
